mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO, TO_CHAR(BOOK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOOK_DATE, TO_CHAR(CHECK_IN,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(CHECK_OUT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_OUT, ROOM_PROCESS, MEMBER_NAME, PRICE, BOOK_ADULTCOUNT , (SELECT ROOM_NUM FROM BOOK_ROOM WHERE BOOK_NO=BOOK.BOOK_NO)AS ROOM_NUM FROM BOOK JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO)

SELECT CHECK_IN,CHECK_OUT,BOOK_NO,ROOM_NUM, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_VIEW_NAME FROM ROOM JOIN ROOM_TYPE USING(ROOM_TYPE_NO) JOIN ROOM_VIEW USING(ROOM_VIEW_NO) LEFT JOIN BOOK_ROOM USING(ROOM_NUM) LEFT JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_NO) WHERE (CHECK_IN <'2022-12-10' OR CHECK_IN IS NULL) AND ROOM_NAME=#{roomName} AND ROOM_VIEW_NAME=#{roomViewName}
SELECT ROOM_VIEW_NAME, ROOM_NAME FROM BOOK JOIN ROOM_VIEW USING(ROOM_VIEW_NO) JOIN ROOM_TYPE USING(ROOM_TYPE_NO) WHERE BOOK_NO=#{bookNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM BOOK_ROOM WHERE BOOK_NO=#{bookNo}
